name: Lena Petrova

resumeText:

Summary: Highly analytical professional with 1 year of experience applying statistical methods and data visualization to drive business insights. Proven ability to manage end-to-end data pipelines and translate complex data findings into actionable recommendations. Seeking a challenging BI role in the finance sector.

Experience:
Junior Data Analyst | RetailTech Solutions | 2023 â€“ Present

situation: Lena is currently employed but feels her current company lacks growth opportunities and the scope of her work is too narrow. She is actively applying to 40+ roles across various industries (tech, finance, healthcare) to maximize her chances of landing a role with better career trajectory and compensation. She uses the AI tool primarily for practicing behavioral questions and structuring case studies.
feedbackStyle: Gives balanced feedback, focusing on areas where the AI's suggestions were too generic or failed to capture industry-specific nuances. She expects concrete examples of how to improve data storytelling.
